Name: The Renovator
About the game: Art is fraught with mysteries. Pictures are being painted for years absorbing the events and the mood of the era. This game will connect you with art and its history. Horror adventure about a restorer. Gameplay Working in the workshop, we will learn the secrets of the past restaurateur and solve problems on which our fate depends. You are waiting for riddles and mysterious history of the exhibits. Perhaps this is just a fantasy, and perhaps there really is something else in this place. STORY In this game you’re an experienced restorer currently working in a museum workshop. The restorer’s friend requested him to fix some old exhibits. From that moment his adventure starts. FEATURES - voice acting - graphics - ambient sounds - minimum prompts - simple operation
